extendedInfo.description: UNIVERSAL COPY AND PASTE!**If you are upgrading from a previous version, please UNINSTALL the app and then REINSTALL. A simple update will not work.**Copy text from ANY screen to your clipboard. Then, paste it into any text box by long-pressing on it.Use this to have copy paste functionality from ANY app or screen!- Copy text to clipboard using on-board or networked OCR recognition.- Copy to clipboard by shaking phone.- Copy to clppboard by long-pressing on search button.- Copy to clipboard by pressing overlay button.- Support for many different languages.NOTE: If this version does not work because your phone is not rooted, please download "Copy Text", which will work on your phone (also available on the Android market). Tags: Copy Paste Clipboard

reviews.title: Devoloper is working
reviews.comment: contacted...multiple times with an unusual su issue and developer resonded each time with a solution. Even going so far as to reach out to chainfire for help. App works well..support this developer.. ! He is doing great work!
reviews.author: Jay Mac

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Fantastic app. This isn\'t just really convenient; it actually creates functionality that didn\'t even exist to start with! Simply superb! Well worth paying for.
reviews.author: Alexander Wedekind

reviews.title: Copy Paste It - bamf
reviews.comment: Copy Paste It - Works great on my Thunderbolt, Bionic and now my Galaxy Nexus. Copy Paste It is very easy to use, does exactly what is advertised. The dev is responsive & helpful. Love network mode.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good stuff
reviews.comment: Excellent stuff, I love it when a conspiracy like disabling android users from communicating efficiently is thwarted!
reviews.author: tom cribb

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I can finally have on Android the same cut-n-paste experience that I have on Desktop.  I just wished it did clipboard management as well. Things get complicated when I want to copy more than one page at a time. Unfortunately, RAM is scarce so I can\'t install another application just to handle that.   This is not whatsoever detrimental to this application. It gets the job done. I\'m just politely asking for yet another feature to a great piece of software.
reviews.author: M\303\241rio Fujikawa

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love this app. Helps me out learning spanish copy and paste
reviews.author: anthony young

reviews.title: Mem leak
reviews.comment: Gets very buggy after copying about 10 pages or so.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Almost never works, rooted HTC EVO 4G LTE

reviews.title: Excellent app.
reviews.comment: Allows me to copy text from any page on my tablet, even where the standard copy/cut/paste won\'t work.
reviews.author: Bob Johnson

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: Very handy, well-designed, works every time.

reviews.comment: Love this app!!

reviews.comment: Dose not work on galaxy tab 2 7 inch gtp3113 would be great if you could remove 3 sec delay but main app don\'t work  ics 4.0.4 also really slow response on droid charge 2.2 froyo
reviews.author: Andrew Andrews

reviews.title: CopyPaste It
reviews.comment: Uninstalled and reinstalled, worked ok in text messaging and like the forward graphic menu presented.  Moved back to 5 star where it was unless something else crops up.  Missing the notification bar icon but as long as it\'s working that\'s not a requirement.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update broken but reinstall works.
reviews.comment: Update broke, as another reviewer stated... uninstall and reinstall for the new version to work. Updating will render the program useless.  Back to 5 stars imo New method seems faster but annoying that screenshots are now saved. Minor niggle.
reviews.author: Matthew Briffa

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This app works beautifully! I use it mostly for copying and pasting addresses and phone numbers but it has several usages. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Copy and Paste
reviews.comment: Took a couple of tries to understand how it works, but I tried about half a dozen apps to get a simple copy and paste function, and this was by far the most versatile and useful one. Others only worked in certain situations, this one works everywhere so far. This is on a Samsung galaxy.  Good tool, good app :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great little utility
reviews.comment: This is a really useful app.  The amount of times I used to be unable to copy /paste is a distant memory now I have this on hand.  Expect a few text errors now and again - it is ocr, but is simple to correct before pasting.
reviews.author: A Google User
